hero.headline: CertisTech
hero.subline: Enterprise-grade audit and document control solutions built for compliance, traceability, and trust.
about.title: About Us
about.body: CertisTech delivers enterprise-grade audit and document control solutions. We combine deep compliance expertise with modern software practices to help institutions achieve traceability, governance, and trust.
about.vision: To be the trusted partner for institutions seeking rigorous, auditable, and compliant technology solutions.
about.mission: We build software that meets bank-grade standards—enabling compliance, governance, and risk teams to operate with confidence and full traceability.
howWeWork.title: How We Work
howWeWork.methodology: We follow an iterative, compliance-first approach—agile where it fits, rigorous where it matters.

howWeWork.steps.title: Discovery
howWeWork.steps.body: Understand your requirements, regulations, and workflows.

howWeWork.steps.title: Design
howWeWork.steps.body: Architect solutions aligned with your governance and audit needs.

howWeWork.steps.title: Build
howWeWork.steps.body: Develop with traceability, roles, and retention built in from day one.

howWeWork.steps.title: Deploy
howWeWork.steps.body: On-prem or local-first deployment with training and handover.

howWeWork.steps.title: Support
howWeWork.steps.body: Ongoing maintenance, updates, and compliance guidance.

standards.title: Bank-Grade Standards. Built for Institutions.
standards.body: We build software aligned with bank-grade standards, designed for institutions that demand strong governance and compliance.
standards.list: Serving: Banks, Insurance, Government, Energy, and Large Enterprises.
